attributes.action: Not let Tony Blair agree to new rules for the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If he agrees to this rule change we will no longer have the best stock market, we will lose our powers to vito new laws we find unfair to the country, we will lose our voice in the UN because if we agree the permanent EU representative will make all the decissions and most of all we will give into the EU
